SEARCH
Package Controllers

Class GameEngine

java.lang.Object
Controllers.GameEngine
public class GameEngine extends Object
Context of the State pattern. It contains a State object (Here, State class is the class Phase).

  • Method Details

    • getCheckIfTest

      public boolean getCheckIfTest()
      Gets the value indicating if the GameEngine is in test mode.
      Returns:
      true if the GameEngine is in test mode, false otherwise.

    • setCheckIfTest

      public void setCheckIfTest(boolean l_checkIfTest)
      Sets the test mode for the GameEngine.
      Parameters:
      l_checkIfTest - true to enable test mode, false otherwise.

    • setPhase

      public void setPhase(Phase p_phase)
      Method that allows the GameEngine object to change its state.
      Parameters:
      p_phase - new state to be set for the GameEngine object.

    • getPhaseName

      public String getPhaseName()
      Gets the name of the current phase.
      Returns:
      The name of the current phase.

    • getPhase

      public Phase getPhase()
      Gets the current phase object.
      Returns:
      The current phase object.

    • start

      public void start()
      This method will ask the user: 1. What part of the game they want to start with (edit map or play game). Depending on the choice, the state will be set to a different object, which will set different behavior. 2. What command they want to execute from the game. Depending on the state of the GameEngine, each command will potentially have a different behavior.

    • getConnectivity

      public Connectivity getConnectivity()
      Gets the connectivity object.
      Returns:
      Connectivity object.

    • setConnectivity

      public void setConnectivity(Connectivity connectivity)
      sets the connectivity object.
      Parameters:
      connectivity - Connectivity object.
